title: Power BI Report Server May 2023 Feature Summary
excerpt: Welcome to the May 2023 Power BI Report Server release! This release has a number of great new features like the Report Server accessibility tagging for screen-reader report consumers, as well as updates to existing features for Modeling, and Reporting.
